#summary Description of the TPJVersionInfo.LanguageCode property.

= !LanguageCode property =

*Project:* Version Information Component.

*Unit:* _PJVersionInfo_. 

*Class:* _[TPJVersionInfo TPJVersionInfo]_

{{{
property LanguageCode: WORD;
}}}

== Description ==

_!LanguageCode_ is a read only property that returns the language code associated with the current translation.

If the current file has no version information then 0 is returned. To get a description of the language use the _[TPJVersionInfoLanguage Language]_ property instead.

See the _langID_ section of the [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa381058 MSDN VERSIONINFO] topic for information about these codes.
